SellAccountOwner.title: Sell Account Owner
SellAccountOwner.description: The name used to identify the legal owner of the account from which to debit funds.

SellAccountIban.title: Sell Account Iban
SellAccountIban.description: International Bank Account Number associated with the sellAccount.

BuyAccountOwner.title: Buy Account Owner
BuyAccountOwner.description: The name used to identify the legal owner of the account in which to credit funds.

BuyAccountIban.title: Buy Account Iban
BuyAccountIban.description: International Bank Account Number associated with the buyAccount.

Attestation.title: Attestation
Attestation.description: Confirmation that the sellAccount and buyAccount are owned by the same legal owner. Options that can be specified are Y and N. Must be Y for the FX trade to be created successfully.

ValueDate.title: Value Date
ValueDate.description: Settlement date for the FX trade.

InstructedAmount.title: Instructed Amount
InstructedAmount.description: Amount instructed to buy or sell.

FixedSide.title: Fixed Side
FixedSide.description: The side of the trade to be fixed. This can either be buy or sell.

BuyCurrency.title: Buy Currency
BuyCurrency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code for the currency to buy.

SellCurrency.title: Sell Currency
SellCurrency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code for the currency to sell.

Margin.title: Margin
Margin.description: The optional margin (as a percentage) from the trade to be credited to a margin account.

MarginAccountIban.title: Margin Account Iban
MarginAccountIban.description: International Bank Account Number associated with the account in which the margin amount is to be deposited.

EndToEndId.title: End To End Id
EndToEndId.description: Unique identifier provided to ClearBank for the FX trade.

UnstructuredInformation.title: Unstructured Information
UnstructuredInformation.description: Additional, optional information about the FX trade.

DebitTransactionId.title: Debit Transaction Id
DebitTransactionId.description: Unique identifier defined by ClearBank for each debit transaction.

DebitAmount.title: Debit Amount
DebitAmount.description: Amount that has been debited from the sell account.

DebitCurrency.title: Debit Currency
DebitCurrency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code for the debit transaction.

DebitTransactionIdentifiers.title: Debit Transaction Identifiers
DebitTransactionIdentifiers.description: Additional identifiers assigned to the debit transaction.

DebitAdditionalProperties.title: Debit Additional Properties
DebitAdditionalProperties.description: Additional properties assigned to the debit transaction which relate to the FX Trade.

DebitCreatedAt.title: Debit Created At
DebitCreatedAt.description: Date and time for when the debit transaction was created.

DebitSettledAt.title: Debit Settled At
DebitSettledAt.description: Date and time for when the debit transaction was settled.

CreditTransactionId.title: Credit Transaction Id
CreditTransactionId.description: Unique identifier defined by ClearBank for each credit transaction.

CreditAmount.title: Credit Amount
CreditAmount.description: Amount that has been credited to the buy account.

CreditCurrency.title: Credit Currency
CreditCurrency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code for the credit transaction.

CreditTransactionIdentifiers.title: Credit Transaction Identifiers
CreditTransactionIdentifiers.description: Additional identifiers assigned to the credit transaction.

CreditAdditionalProperties.title: Credit Additional Properties
CreditAdditionalProperties.description: Additional properties assigned to the credit transaction which relate to the FX Trade.

CreditCreatedAt.title: Credit Created At
CreditCreatedAt.description: Date and time for when the credit transaction was created.

CreditSettledAt.title: Credit Settled At
CreditSettledAt.description: Date and time for when the credit transaction was settled.

MarginTransactionId.title: Margin Transaction Id
MarginTransactionId.description: Unique identifier defined by ClearBank for each margin transaction.

MarginAmount.title: Margin Amount
MarginAmount.description: The margin amount credited to the margin account.

MarginCurrency.title: Margin Currency
MarginCurrency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code for the margin transaction.

MarginTransactionIdentifiers.title: Margin Transaction Identifiers
MarginTransactionIdentifiers.description: Additional identifiers assigned to the margin transaction.

MarginAdditionalProperties.title: Margin Additional Properties
MarginAdditionalProperties.description: Additional properties assigned to the margin transaction which relate to the FX Trade

MarginCreatedAt.title: Margin Created At
MarginCreatedAt.description: Date and time for when the margin transaction was created.

MarginSettledAt.title: Margin Settled At
MarginSettledAt.description: Date and time for when the margin transaction was settled.
